Texts.Eng: Bring the ^green;Greenhouse^reset; to ^orange;me^reset; at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;
Texts.Chs: 把^orange;温室^reset;带回^orange;科学前哨站^reset;给^green;我^reset;。

Texts.Eng: Thanks so much. You are a life saver! Now I can tinker with plant life! Maybe I can figure out how to upgrade it, too!
Texts.Chs: 非常谢谢你，你真是帮了我一个大忙！现在我可以拯救这些植物了，也许我还可以找到把它升级的方法。

Texts.Eng: ^orange;Greenhouses^reset; are all the rage these days. I want one, but my budget can't swing it. Do you have one lying around I might use?
Texts.Chs: ^orange;温室^reset;可以让植物不受外界干扰。我想要一个，但是很可惜我没有足够的预算。请问你可以为我制作一个吗？
